com.crudetech.matcher

Class ThrowsException

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<T>
      • org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher<Runnable>
        • com.crudetech.matcher.ThrowsException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.hamcrest.Matcher<Runnable>, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing

    public class ThrowsException
extends org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher<Runnable>
    A Matcher implementation that checks if exceptions were thrown. It takes a Runnable implementation, executes it catches any thrown exception and examines it.
